text: Trying to search through a HubDB table (with API access enabled), but it's not returning any results. Do I need to specify anything else than `portalId`, `tableId` and `term` in the query in order for it to work? :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UD5NW4PJ5> ah, that's probably what it was. I can probably just not use the analytics

Hi <@U6GNQ7JBU>, it's the search API: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content>

I'm hitting the end point with this query:

`?portalId=12345&tableId=12345&term=video`

And I'm getting a response. But no results, even though the table in question has entries that contain the term.

This API is for searching the content on your site. If you have dynamic pages generated from a HubDB table, you can specify only searching those with the `tableId` parameter. This API does not search your HubDB tables.
<@UD5NW4PJ5> A-ha... Well that explains it - thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
